decision_conditions: The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

<p><span style="font-size: 14px;">The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents:</span></p><p><span style="font-size: 14px; line-height: 107%; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">PL-01,
PL-02, PL03, PL-04</span><br></p><p><br></p>
The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

<p class="MsoNormal">The development hereby permitted shall not be commenced
until works for the disposal of sewage, disposal of surface water and surface water attenuation and storage works have been provided on site in accordance
with details to be submitted to, and approved in writing by, the local planning
authority. The works shall thereafter be retained.<br></p><p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="">To ensure that the necessary construction and design
criteria for the development&nbsp;</span>proposals follow approved conditions.</p><p>







</p><p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="">The applicant should contact Thames Water Utilities
Limited and the Harrow Infrastructure Team at the earliest opportunity.<i style="color: rgb(255, 102, 255);"><o:p></o:p></i></span></p>
description: Single storey front infill  extension; single storey rear extension; conversion of garage to habitable room; alterations and extension to raise roof height of single storey side to rear extension; external alterations (demolition of rear extension and bay window)
